author: Parikshit Mishra
title: Metaplanet Overtakes Musk's Tesla, Becomes Fifth Largest Corporate Bitcoin Holder
description: The Tokyo-listed firm now holds 12,345 BTC.
content:
Metaplanet, the Japanese hotelier that has been scooping up bitcoin 
, has become the fifth largest corporate holder of the largest cryptocurrency, racing past Elon Musk's Tesla.The Tokyo-listed fir… [+707 chars]
